SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the clockwise direction from Tourist Satisfaction Rate ?
SRP.A: The next dimension clockwise from Tourist Satisfaction Rate  is Hotel Occupancy Rate

SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the counterclockwise direction from Tourist Satisfaction Rate ?
SRP.A: The next dimension counterclockwise from Tourist Satisfaction Rate  is Return on Investment (ROI)Local Community Engagement Rate.

SRP.Q: On the Return on Investment (ROI)Local Community Engagement Rate, is the point for Stevenport inside or outside the point for Nataliemouth?
SRP.A: On the Return on Investment (ROI)Local Community Engagement Rate, the point for Stevenport is outside the point for Nataliemouth.

VPR.Q: What are the strongest and weakest dimension of Davisland?

VPR.Q: On dimension Attraction Capacity Utilization Rate, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Attraction Capacity Utilization Rate, label {Davisland} scores the highest.

VPR.Q: On dimension Hotel Occupancy Rate, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Hotel Occupancy Rate, label {Davisland} scores the lowest.

MSR.Q: For Nataliemouth, based on the data shown in the radar chart, which dimension does it most need to improve?
